author: dvoytenko
message:
Upgrade @playwright/test and cleanup internal APIs (#77659)

Addressing the API incompatibility in the newest Playwright release:
https://github.com/microsoft/playwright/issues/27059#issuecomment-2733762056

cc @wyozi
